attributes.title: Crazy Orange🍊
attributes.review: I downloaded this app which ofc took over a day to download after it fully downloaded all it did was play elevator music so I was getting ready to delete the app when the crazy orange man kicked down my door walked up to my dog and threw my dog through my living room window I tried to hit him but he would just moan then he just left worst app ever😡

attributes.title: Interesting app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping to find a way to engage in the coming election.  This app is very hard to navigate.  It may have to do with the China virus creating bugs in my phone.  The reviews I’ve seen saying this app and the President are wonderful are clearly fake news!  Definitely removing from my phone before my fingers turn any oranger!

attributes.title: never again😢
attributes.review: right when i opened the app an orange smashed through my window and bonked me on the forehead!!! it was so traumatizing💔 the orange bumped my brain so hard i forgot my own name 😭😭💢 when the orange dropped on my toe i see “TRUMP2020” written on it with blue ink😟😕😕 now i have to scrub this stupid ink off my face and bandage my toe 😒😒 if this is the message trump wants to send then i am NOT voting for him!! thanks a lot PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES. 👎👎👎

attributes.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.review: first off the app took way to long to download and when it did it was one of the worst I’ve ever seen. It opened with a picture of a big, fat 🍊and gave me an overall racist vibe. All I wanted to do was support the president! I even bought 5 tickets to his rally, although I got busy pole dancing with my fish. I definitely do not recommend this app, 1 star ✨😌❤️
